sentence.Network_en: An exultant party leader said: "He will be an excellent MP."
sentence.Network_cn: 一位满面喜色的政党领袖说：“他会成为一名出色的议员。”

sentence.Network_en: The exultant crowds were dancing in the streets.
sentence.Network_cn: 欢欣的人群在大街上跳起了舞.

sentence.Network_en: The young gentleman uttered this exultant sound with mysterious significance.
sentence.Network_cn: 这位少爷发出这种兴高采烈的呼喊是带有神秘的意思的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 求英文中表达感情的形容词！！！！！！_百度知道 ... exult 非常高兴 exultant 非常高兴的 glad to meet you 很高兴认识你.
词根联想记忆法词汇教程(三)|联想记忆法背单词 ... exude v. 流出；渗出 exultant adj. 狂欢的；欢腾的 eyewitness n. 目击者.
gre词汇精选（最新词汇） - 豆丁网 ... extrude 挤出，逐出；突出 exultant 非常高兴的，欢跃的 facsimile 复制本，摹本.
Valley at Sunset-山谷夕照--英语作文网 ... rumble 呼呼作响 exultant 兴高采烈的，狂喜的 whoop （欢乐的）高喊，高呼.

list.abs: the port is near , the bells I hear , the people exulting .港口临近了，我已听见钟声，听到了人们的欢呼。
To swell with pride ; gloat or exult ., 自负骄傲自大 ; 心满意足或狂喜.
as Tom King thus ruminated , there came to his stolid vision the form of youth exultant and invincible .就在汤姆·金这样回想的时候，在他迟钝的头脑里出现了一个趾高气扬、不可一世的青年形象。
He obviously exulted in winning ., 他获胜后喜形于色.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Latin exsultant- 'exulting', from the verb exsultare

entry.tran: 欢欣的;欢喜的;洋洋得意的
entry.def: If you are exultant, you feel very happy and proud about something you have done.

example.ex: An exultant party leader said: 'He will be an excellent MP.'
example.tran: 一位满面喜色的政党领袖说：“他会成为一名出色的议员。”

means.word_mean: 1. joyful and proud especially because of triumph or success;

sentences.sentence: "rejoicing crowds filled the streets on VJ Day"

auth_sentence.content: Joe Vitale, an ecumenical healer, strikes an exultant note.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Joe Vitale, an ecumenical healer, strikes an exultant note.

auth_sentence.content: Young DPJ workers were exultant Sunday night.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Young DPJ workers were exultant Sunday night.

auth_sentence.content: The Mayor's own speech, at least as written, was similarly exultant.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Mayor's own speech, at least as written, was similarly exultant.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Mayor's own speech, at least as written, was similarly exultant.
